title: Gym Workout Place — Dark fitness marketing website (frontend)

requirements.summary: Create and apply a consistent modern dark (black/red/dark grey) design system with bold typography, strong CTAs, and responsive spacing across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent header/footer, typography scale, button styles, spacing, and dark theme colors (black/red/dark grey).
Primary CTAs are visually prominent and accessible (contrast, focus states).
Layout is mobile-first and responsive across common breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Add global styles for the dark energetic theme (color tokens, typography scale, focus states, spacing defaults) and enable smooth, readable defaults across breakpoints.
Extend Tailwind theme tokens to support the gym dark palette (black/red/dark grey), consistent radii/shadows, and reusable semantic color names that will be used throughout the UI.
Centralize shared design constants (site name, nav items, social links, CTA labels, reusable className strings) to keep styling consistent across pages.
Create a reusable section wrapper component for consistent spacing, max-width, and headings across pages.
Create a reusable CTA button wrapper using shadcn-ui (e.g., Button) styling variants for primary/secondary CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement site-wide sticky header navigation, footer with social icons/links, and smooth scrolling for in-page anchors.
acceptanceCriteria: Header remains visible while scrolling and provides navigation to each page.
Footer includes social icons that link to placeholder external URLs (configurable).
Smooth scrolling is enabled for anchor jumps without breaking normal routing.

file_operations.description: Implement a sticky, accessible header with navigation links to Home, About, Workouts/Programs, Trainers, Membership/Plans, Gallery, Contact. Use shadcn-ui navigation-related primitives where appropriate (e.g., buttons/menus). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a footer with configurable placeholder social media links and icon buttons. Use shadcn-ui Button for icon-button styling consistency. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a shared page layout that composes SiteHeader + main content + SiteFooter and ensures consistent padding and background across routes.
Add a small hook to perform smooth scrolling to hash anchors when the route changes (without breaking normal routing).
Wire SiteLayout and all page routes; ensure navigation links and hash-based section jumps work correctly (including smooth scrolling via useScrollToHash).

requirements.summary: Build the Home page with hero, required headline/sub-text, CTAs, and sections: Why Choose Us, Popular Workouts, Transformation Highlights, Testimonials.
acceptanceCriteria: Home hero displays the exact headline and sub-text provided.
CTA buttons are visible above the fold on mobile and route/scroll to appropriate sections/pages (Join Now → Plans, Free Trial → Contact form, Contact Us → Contact page/section).
Why Choose Us shows exactly the three benefit items specified.
Popular Workouts, Transformations, and Testimonials render with images and readable content on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Implement Home page sections and ensure hero includes the exact headline “Transform Your Body. Transform Your Life.” and provided sub-text; include CTAs wired to Plans and Contact. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button components for consistent section UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable testimonial card component for the Home testimonials section using shadcn-ui Card primitives. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a small feature card component for “Why Choose Us” items with consistent icon/heading/body styling using shadcn-ui Card. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Home route and ensure header navigation points to it; wire in-page section anchors on Home (e.g., #workouts, #testimonials) where applicable.

requirements.summary: Create the About Us page with a hero image, the provided mission text, and values section (Discipline, Consistency, Results).
acceptanceCriteria: About page includes the exact provided paragraph and the three values.
Hero image renders correctly on mobile and desktop (no overflow/layout shift).

file_operations.description: Implement About page with hero image, exact mission paragraph text, and a values section listing Discipline, Consistency, Results. Use shadcn-ui Card for the values list styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the About route and ensure header navigation links to it.

requirements.summary: Create the Workouts/Programs page with nine program sections, each including a high-quality image and 2–3 line description, responsive on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: All nine programs are present, each with an image and a 2–3 line description.
Layout supports grid/list views that remain readable on small screens.

file_operations.description: Implement Workouts/Programs page containing all nine required programs with images and 2–3 line descriptions; implement a responsive grid that becomes a single-column list on small screens. Use shadcn-ui Card for program tiles. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable program card component (image, title, short description) using shadcn-ui Card primitives for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Workouts/Programs route and ensure header navigation links to it.

requirements.summary: Create the Trainers page with professional trainer images and at least 3 trainer cards including the specified details text.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 trainer cards are displayed with images and the specified details (as text).
Cards are responsive and maintain consistent styling with the rest of the site.

file_operations.description: Implement Trainers page with at least three trainer cards (images) and required text: “Certified Fitness Coach”, “Experience in weight loss & muscle building”, “Personal training support”. Use shadcn-ui Card for consistent card styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a reusable trainer card component using shadcn-ui Card primitives and accessible image/alt text conventions. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Trainers route and ensure header navigation links to it.

requirements.summary: Create the Membership/Plans page with four pricing cards listing required features and clear CTAs to contact/free trial.
acceptanceCriteria: All four plans are shown as pricing cards with the four specified features.
Each plan includes a CTA that routes to Contact/Free Trial or opens the contact form section.

file_operations.description: Implement Membership/Plans page with pricing cards for Monthly, Quarterly, Half-Yearly, Yearly plans; include required features and CTA buttons that navigate to the Contact page and/or the contact form section. Use shadcn-ui Card/Button for pricing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create reusable pricing card component including title, price placeholder, feature list, and CTA button using shadcn-ui Card/Button. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Membership/Plans route and ensure header navigation links to it.

requirements.summary: Create the Gallery page with categorized image sections: gym interior, workout sessions, equipment photos, client workout moments.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery renders at least 4 categories with multiple images per category.
Images load responsively with consistent aspect ratios/cropping.

file_operations.description: Implement Gallery page with four categories (interior/workout/equipment/client moments) and multiple responsive images per category using consistent cropping/aspect ratios.
Create a reusable responsive image grid component for gallery categories (uniform aspect ratio, lazy-loading where appropriate).
Register the Gallery route and ensure header navigation links to it.

requirements.summary: Create the Contact Us page with a validated contact form (success state), WhatsApp/Call/Google Maps external links, and business info (address/phone/hours).
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields and shows a success state after submission.
WhatsApp and Call buttons are actionable on mobile (tel: link for call; https://wa.me/... link for WhatsApp) using configurable placeholders.
Map is provided as an external Google Maps link (opens in new tab).
Business info (address/phone/hours) is displayed on the page.

file_operations.description: Implement Contact page layout: business info, external links for WhatsApp (wa.me), Call (tel:), Google Maps (new tab), and a contact form with validation + success state. Use shadcn-ui Input/Textarea/Button components for consistent form UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a contact form component with required field validation, loading/submitted states, and submit handler that calls the backend capability via useActor(). Use shadcn-ui form controls for accessibility and styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a business info component that reads address/phone/opening hours (using the backend actor where available) and renders them with accessible markup.
Register the Contact route and ensure header navigation links to it; ensure Plans/Home CTAs can navigate to Contact and optionally to the form section hash.

requirements.summary: Improve SEO and accessibility: semantic headings, per-route page titles, labeled form fields, keyboard navigable menus, and visible focus states.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has exactly one H1 and logical subsequent headings.
Page titles are set per route (e.g., “Home | Gym Workout Place”).
Form fields have associated labels; interactive elements are keyboard accessible and show visible focus states.

file_operations.description: Add a small hook to set document.title per route/page (e.g., “Home | Gym Workout Place”) without adding new dependencies.
Ensure the header navigation is keyboard accessible (tab order, visible focus styles) and uses semantic navigation markup.
Ensure Home page heading hierarchy (exactly one H1, logical H2/H3 in sections) and apply per-page title via usePageTitle.
Ensure About page heading hierarchy and apply per-page title via usePageTitle.
Ensure Programs page heading hierarchy and apply per-page title via usePageTitle.
Ensure Trainers page heading hierarchy and apply per-page title via usePageTitle.
Ensure Plans page heading hierarchy and apply per-page title via usePageTitle.
Ensure Gallery page heading hierarchy and apply per-page title via usePageTitle.
Ensure Contact page heading hierarchy, labeled form fields (via ContactForm), and apply per-page title via usePageTitle.
Add/verify global focus-visible styles and accessible contrast defaults for interactive elements across the dark theme.

acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Home/About/Programs/Trainers/Gallery use the generated images (no broken links).
The site remains performant (use reasonable image dimensions for their usage).
